metadata.title: CVE-2021-39911 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper access control flaw in all versions of GitLab CE/EE startingfrom 13.9 before 14.2.6, all versions starting from 14.3 before 14.3.4, andall versions starting from 14.4 before 14.4.1 exposes private email addressof Issue and Merge Requests assignee to Webhook data consumers

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
